parameter.value: The churches of the gods entrusted me with the enormous and responsible task to lead the inquisition. I leave the field work to inquisitors who I recruit from fitting people that cross my way.
Do you wish to join the inquisition?
So be it. Now you are a member of the inquisition. You may ask me for a mission to raise in my esteem.
Let's see if you are worthy. Take and inquisitor's field guide from the box in the back room...{continue}
Follow the instructions in the guide to talk to the Thaian Guards that protect the walls and gates of the city and test their loyalty. The report to me about your mission.
